column2: Adhik matra me garbh-nirodhak lena apke swasthya ke liye nuksandeh hai. Isse pet seene tatha sar me dard jee michlana jaisi shikaetein ho sakti hai.
Agar koi HIV se peedit insaan sahi tarike se apna upchaar nahi karwata to AIDS hone me 10 saal se bhi kam samay lagta hai.
Dark Chocolates mein anti-oxidants tatha phenylethylamine hote hain jo apke andar utsaah jagate hain. Sath hi ye sankraman se bhi bachate hain.
Missionary position garbhdharan ke liye sabse uchit awastha hai. Is awastha mein shukranu yoni tak kaafi najdeeki se pahuch pate hain.
Asurakshit maukhik sex sambhog ki tarah hi hanikarak hai. Aisa balpurvak karna muh mein tatha peshab ke samay jananango mein peeda utpann kar sakta hai.
Agar ek garbhwati stri HIV se peedit hai to virus garbhdharan delivery ya stanpaan ke dauraan shishu tak pahuch sakta hai.
Ek HIV positive mahila tatha ek HIV negative purush kritrim garbhadhan ke dwara  garbhdharan kar sakte hain. Isme kisi bhi prakar ka HIV sankraman nahi hota.
Yah ek sarvagyat tathya hai ki sambhog sharer ki urza badhata hai. Sath hi yah tanaw kam karta hai tatha wajan mein kami lata hai.
Maukhik sex anchahe garbh ki sambhawna se bachata hai. Chuki shukranu ka nikas much me hota hai to isse garbhdharan nahi ho sakta.
Condoms HIV se bachne ke sarvottam garbh-nirodhak upayo me se ek hai. Sath hi yah janm par niyantran karne wale goliyo se acha hota hai.
Vitamin B- complex yani ki Vitamin B1 se B5 aur B12 apke apki sex utkantha badhane mein madad karta hai. Sath hi yah sharer mein raktsanchaar bhi badhata hai.
Ek se adhik saathi ke sath maukhik sambhog karna STD yani ki Sexually Transmitted Disease ko badhawa de sakta hai. Isse sankraman ke khatre badh jate hain.
Sambhog ke dauran ek doosre ki taraf letna dono saathiyo pakafi had tak bhar kam karta hai. Ye wajni mahilaon ke liye jyada sahayak hai.
Apni aankhein band karke apne saathi ko pyaar se choomna dono ke andar ek hone ke atrang bhaw ko utpann karne mein madad karta hai.
Sex therapists ke anusar mahilaein jinhone sambhog ka anand liya hai ve un mein se ek hain jinhe khud se pyaar hai. To pehle khud se pyaar karna seekhein.
